Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Chicago to Los Angeles on 6/18/1989 (Going to LAD: P Turk Wendell, SS Pat Listach. Going to CHC: P Paul Assenmacher, P Jim Corsi)...
Injured on 4/10/1991 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/19/1991, off Jeff Tabaka (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1993, off Kevin Wickander (STL)...
